programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.

programme.title: North Hollywood
programme.desc: A youngster must decide between choosing the future his father wants and following his dream of becoming a pro skateboarder. Confronted with the uncertainty of his future - and how it might impact his friends and family - he takes steps to build relationships with professional skaters in an effort to forge his own path. Comedy drama, starring Ryder McLaughlin, Vince Vaughn and Miranda Cosgrove.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser discovers a new sense of purpose when she meets a widower working to provide for his daughters. Drama, starring Hilary Swank, Alan Ritchson and Nancy Travis.

programme.title: Soft & Quiet
programme.desc: An elementary school teacher organises a mixer of like-minded women, when she encounters a woman from her past, leading to an explosive chain of events. Thriller, starring Stefanie Estes and Olivia Luccardi.

programme.desc: Five teenagers who occupy different areas of their school's social structure are thrown together for a Saturday morning detention. Drama, directed by John Hughes and starring Emilio Estevez, Judd Nelson, Molly Ringwald, Anthony Michael Hall, Ally Sheedy and Paul Gleason.

Fact-based drama, starring Oscar winners Matthew McConaughey and Jared Leto, with Jennifer Garner and Steve Zahn.

programme.title: Spotlight
programme.desc: A team of investigative reporters for a Boston newspaper look into claims of children being molested within the Catholic church. The journalists discover the situation is far worse than it seemed, as they find a conspiracy among the city's legal, religious and government establishments to cover up decades of abuse. Oscar-winning fact-based drama, starring Mark Ruffalo, Michael Keaton, Rachel McAdams and Stanley Tucci.

programme.desc: As he attends an ultra-competitive training camp with an Olympic place up for grabs, an Israeli swimmer starts to fall for one of his competitors. Drama, starring Omer Perelman Striks. In Hebrew with subtitles.

programme.title: Chuck Chuck Baby
programme.desc: Helen lives with her ex-husband, his 20-year-old girlfriend, their new baby, and his dying mother Gwen. Helen's life is a grind, but she has a chance at romance when a secret love returns. Writer/director Janis Pugh's drama, starring Louise Brealey and Annabel Scholey.

programme.title: Widow Clicquot
programme.desc: In the late 18th century, a group of women create the Veuve Clicquot champagne business. Drama, starring Haley Bennett, Tom Sturridge and Sam Riley.(n)

programme.title: The Starling Girl
programme.desc: A young woman struggles with her place within her Christian fundamentalist community, but everything changes when a charismatic pastor returns to her church. Writer/director Laurel Parmet's drama, starring Eliza Scanlen and Lewis Pullman.(n)

programme.title: Finding You
programme.desc: Violinist Finley Sinclair travels to an Irish coastal village to begin her semester studying abroad. At the B\u0026B run by her host family, she encounters the gregarious and persistent heartthrob movie star Beckett Rush. Romantic drama, starring Rose Reid, Katherine McNamara, Vanessa Redgrave, Jedidiah Goodacre and Judith Hoag.(n)

programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: British broadcaster and journalist David Frost comes up with the idea of setting up a series of exclusive televised interviews with the disgraced former president of the United States, Richard Nixon. Believing he could use the publicity as a chance to resurrect his political career and make some easy money, Nixon agrees but soon realises he has underestimated Frost. Fact-based drama, starring Frank Langella, Michael Sheen, Sam Rockwell and Kevin Bacon.(n)

programme.title: Quartet
programme.desc: Three former opera singers prepare for their annual concert to mark Verdi's birthday and raise funds for their retirement home. However, this year, a famous diva has joined the group, and her history with the others threatens the performance. Comedy drama, directed by Dustin Hoffman and starring Maggie Smith, Billy Connolly, Tom Courtenay, Pauline Collins and Michael Gambon.(n)

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.desc: A stand-up comedian struggling with PTSD agonises over whether or not to join the search for a missing teenage girl she used to look after. Writer-director Ally Pankiw's comedy drama, starring Rachel Sennott and Olga Petsa.(n)

programme.title: The Watched
programme.desc: Mina, a 28-year old artist, gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. When Mina finds shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers that are stalked by mysterious creatures each night. Horror, starring Dakota Fanning, Georgina Campbell and Olwen Fouere.(n)

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Computer engineering company executive Curtis is coerced into testing a new digital assistant named AIA to secure a lucrative business contract with two tech geniuses. At first, the omnipresent artificial intelligence simplifies day-to-day life. However, AIA becomes dangerously protective of the clan. Writer/director Chris Weitz's sci-fi horror, starring John Cho, Katherine Waterston and Keith Carradine.(n)

programme.title: Rob Peace
programme.desc: A young man is torn between his father's shadowed past and his own promising future. Raised by his devoted mother, Rob Peace risks everything he has worked for to free his imprisoned dad. Drama, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor, who also adapted Jeff Hobbs' book and directed, with Jay Will, Camila Cabello and Mary J Blige.(n)

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1
programme.desc: Families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas during the 19th century. Meanwhile, a seasoned cowboy goes on the run with a prostitute and a young lad after killing a fellow gunman. Western, starring Kevin Costner, who also co-wrote and directed, with Sienna Miller and Sam Worthington.(n)

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. The trio become concerned when the Old Man, who narrates their illustrated existence, suddenly falls silent. Using his magical crayon, Harold draws a door to the real world and tumbles into the present day as a flesh-and-blood man, who collides head-on with widow Terry and her young son, Mel. Family adventure, starring Zachary Levi, Lil Rel Howery, Zooey Deschanel and Benjamin Bottani.(n)

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: A mercenary is assigned a target on a flight, but when rival assassins board the plane, the hunter and the hunted are forced to team up. Action thriller, starring Josh Hartnett, Katee Sackhoff and Julian Kostov.(n)

A rival called Angel opens in close proximity and soon after, her email is hacked and tyres slashed. Director Austin Peters' thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks and Lewis Pullman.(n)

programme.desc: In 1980s Hollywood, adult film star and aspiring actress Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. The third instalment of director Ti West's acclaimed X film series, starring Mia Goth, Lily Collins, Giancarlo Esposito and Kevin Bacon.

programme.title: The Watched
programme.desc: Mina, a 28-year old artist, gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. When Mina finds shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers that are stalked by mysterious creatures each night. Horror, starring Dakota Fanning, Georgina Campbell and Olwen Fouere.

programme.title: Rob Peace
programme.desc: A young man is torn between his father's shadowed past and his own promising future. Raised by his devoted mother, Rob Peace risks everything he has worked for to free his imprisoned dad. Drama, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor, who also adapted Jeff Hobbs' book and directed, with Jay Will, Camila Cabello and Mary J Blige.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: As part of a patrol tasked with clearing stray dogs before the 2008 Olympics, former stunt motorcyclist Lang bonds with a hound. Drama, starring Eddie Peng and Tong Liya. In Chinese with English subtitles.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Computer engineering company executive Curtis is coerced into testing a new digital assistant named AIA to secure a lucrative business contract with two tech geniuses. Writer/director Chris Weitz's sci-fi horror, starring John Cho, Katherine Waterston and Keith Carradine.

programme.title: Anon
programme.desc: Stylish sci-fi thriller starring Clive Owen as a troubled near-future detective investigating a series of mysterious murders. Sky Cinema Original Film.

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: An astronaut crew descends into madness while on a multi-generational mission. Sky Original film starring Colin Farrell, Tye Sheridan and Lily-Rose Depp.

programme.title: Murder At Yellowstone City
programme.desc: The once booming Yellowstone City has fallen on hard times, but when a local prospector strikes gold, things start to look up - until he's found dead. Sky Original Western.

programme.title: Extinct
programme.desc: Two extinct Flummels (fluffy, rabbit-like creatures) are transported from 1835 to modern-day Shanghai. Animated fun.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: Sky original offering a thrilling update to Dickens's classic tale, as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century. With Michael Caine, Rita Ora and Lena Headey.

programme.title: Robin And The Hoods
programme.desc: 11-year-old Robin and her friends must protect their beloved play area from developers. Family friendly Sky Original fantasy with Naomie Harris and Gwendoline Christie.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: When a writer visits a medium for help with a creative block, they unwittingly summon the spirit of his dead first wife and a love triangle unfolds with his current spouse.

programme.title: The Estate
programme.desc: Two sisters try to win over their terminally ill aunt in hopes of becoming the beneficiaries of her wealthy estate. Black comedy starring Toni Collette and Anna Faris.

programme.title: Maggie Moore(s)
programme.desc: A police chief investigates the bizarre murders of two women with the same name and unravels a web of small-town lies. Sky Original comedy thriller with Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Gunpowder Milkshake
programme.desc: A smooth mother-daughter assassin duo protect a small girl from a ruthless crime syndicate. Starring Lena Headey and Karen Gillan.

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Step inside an English finishing school housing the daughters of prominent Nazi Germans 17 days before the start of WWII. Drama starring Dame Judi Dench and Eddie Izzard.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: Ex-Formula 1 racer Enzo Ferrari launches his team into the perilous 1,000-mile Mille Miglia race. Sky Original film from Michael Mann with Adam Driver and PenÃ©lope Cruz.

programme.title: The Radleys
programme.desc: The Radleys are a normal family, but have a dark secret - they are abstaining vampires with bloodthirsty instincts. Sky Original film with Damian Lewis and Kelly Macdonald.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Monster action adventure starring Rebecca Hall, Brian Tyree Henry and Dan Stevens. Since the Titans' last confrontation, Kong has decamped underground and is exploring the vast, fantastical world of "Hollow Earth". Meanwhile, Godzilla is up on the Earth's surface, keeping other monsters in check. However, a subterranean distress call initiates events that will see the two old foes face off against

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Alexander SkarsgÃ¥rd, Samuel L Jackson and Margot Robbie. Tarzan, now living in England as Lord Greystoke, returns to the Congo to investigate a slave trader.

programme.title: Monkey Man
programme.desc: Action thriller directed by and starring Dev Patel. A nameless young man known only as Kid makes his living as a masked participant at a seedy underground fight club where he is beaten up regularly. But there is method in his madness, as he works toward exacting revenge against those responsible for his traumatic past.

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: After his daughter is murdered, a high school coach takes matters into his own hands and hunts down her killers. Action thriller, starring Dermot Mulroney, Jeff Fahey and Mauricio Mendoza.

programme.title: There's Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Festive horror comedy starring Martin Starr and Amrita Acharia. After inheriting a house in the mountains of Norway, an American family ups sticks from California and relocates. However, their decision to convert the property's old barn into an Airbnb unwittingly disturbs the creature that lives there - and hell hath no fury like an angry barn elf.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Biopic
programme.desc: When life inspires film, the most incredible stories are told. Join us as we journey through some of our favourite biopics, from Sky Original film Lee to Goodfellas and Back to Black.

programme.title: Under the Boardwalk
programme.desc: Armen is a land crab who lives under a boardwalk at the Jersey Shore. When he falls for Ramona, a sea crab tourist, tensions between their friends and families rise. However, a storm casts the duo far from home, leading to an epic adventure which unites the divided community. Animated musical comedy, featuring the voices of Keke Palmer and Michael Cera.

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: Crime drama starring Liam Neeson. An ageing career criminal and former boxer discovers he has developed a neurodegenerative disease that gives him only months to live. His flashes of memory loss at work soon cause trouble, but redemption beckons when he attempts to reconnect with his estranged daughter and grandson.

programme.title: IF
programme.desc: Part-animated comedy fantasy starring Cailey Fleming and Ryan Reynolds. Staying with her grandmother while her father is in hospital, young Bea discovers that she can now see strange creatures - which turn out to be people's imaginary friends, or "IFs". When neighbour Cal explains that the IFs are lonely because their human friends have now grown up, Bea joins him in a quest to match the IFs with

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: Supernatural adventure starring Paul Rudd, featuring Bill Murray and Dan Aykroyd. The spook-hunting Spengler family joins forces with the original Ghostbusters, whose work is continuing via a secret research lab. When an ancient artefact is discovered and releases an evil force, the team must work together to prevent the dawning of a new Ice Age.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Monster action adventure starring Rebecca Hall, Brian Tyree Henry and Dan Stevens. Since the Titans' last confrontation, Kong has decamped underground and is exploring the vast, fantastical world of "Hollow Earth". Meanwhile, Godzilla is up on the Earth's surface, keeping other monsters in check. However, a subterranean distress call initiates events that will see the two old foes face off against

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: Action thriller in which Vin Diesel and Paul Walker, the stars of the first film in the street-racing franchise, team up again. Criminal Dominic Toretto returns to LA to avenge the murder of one of his friends by a drug kingpin, bringing him face to face with an old rival - FBI agent Brian O'Conner.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 5
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Dwayne Johnson, Vin Diesel and Paul Walker. Fugitive Dominic Toretto assembles his old team to steal $100 million from Brazil's most corrupt businessman so that they can disappear for ever. But with tenacious FBI agent Luke Hobbs on their trail, their plan just got a lot more complicated.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker and Dwayne Johnson. Following a heist in Rio, Dominic Toretto's gang has dispersed to different places around the world. But the offer of reassembling for one last job proves attractive when it carries with it the chance of a pardon for past misdemeanours.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson and Jason Statham. When it becomes apparent that someone out for revenge is picking off members of his crew one by one, Dominic Toretto decides the gang should get back together. But no sooner have they reassembled than they're co-opted by a shadowy agency figure, who needs the team's special skills to help steal a surveillance devic

programme.title: Gran Turismo
programme.desc: Nineteen-year-old Jann Mardenborough beats thousands of other gamers in the GT Academy competition organised by marketing executive Danny Moore. His prize is an opportunity to sit behind the wheel of a real racing car after intensive training from cynical former driver Jack Salter. Drama, starring David Harbour, Orlando Bloom and Archie Madekwe.

programme.title: Being Mary Tyler Moore
programme.desc: Chronicling the vanguard career of Mary Tyler Moore, weaving her personal narrative with the beats of her professional accomplishments, highlighting her groundbreaking roles and the indelible impact she had on generations of women who came after her.

programme.title: Saving My Tomorrow
programme.desc: A 12-year-old becomes an environmental activist; the impact of warming temperatures and pollution on fish; the impact of climate change on species like the mosquito and the giant crab; readings by Tina Fey, Jeffrey Wright and Liam Neeson.

programme.title: Saving My Tomorrow
programme.desc: The recovery of the bald eagle from near-extinction provides a lesson on how conservation can reverse environmental damage; an environmental activism group for children spreads awareness; weather extremes; protecting newly hatched sea turtles.

programme.title: Stand Up & Shout: Songs From a Philly High School
programme.desc: Students at Philadelphia's Hill-Freedman World Academy work with local musicians to create an album of powerful, original songs that captures both the challenging times they're living in and the joy that music brings.

programme.title: Belichick & Saban: The Art of Coaching
programme.desc: An examination of the four-decade friendship and respective coaching histories of Bill Belichick and Nick Saban, and their repeated championship success on the fields of professional and college football.

programme.title: The Addams Family 2
programme.desc: Hoping to get closer as a family, Gomez, Morticia and the rest of the Addams clan embark on an adventurous road trip in a hideous and humongous camper.

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: While a man (Jack Black) is on assignment in the Bermuda Triangle, a vortex transports him to Lilliput, a magic land of little people.

programme.title: DC League of Super-Pets
programme.desc: Krypto the Super-Dog must convince a ragtag group of animals to master their own newfound powers to help him save Superman and the rest of the Justice League.

programme.title: Rio

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: A poor boy (Freddie Highmore) and four spoiled children win a tour through the incredible factory of an odd confectioner (Johnny Depp).

programme.title: Wonka

programme.title: Blue Beetle

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: Dangerously ill with a rare blood disorder and determined to save others from the same fate, Dr. Morbius attempts a desperate gamble. While at first it seems to be a radical success, a darkness inside of him is soon unleashed.

programme.desc: Everything goes to hell for newly pregnant Belinda after her mother-in-law moves in. As the diabolical guest tries to get her claws on the child, Belinda must draw the line somewhere.

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: Trapped on the streets of Washington, D.C., a presidential candidate (Elizabeth Mitchell) and her head of security (Frank Grillo) must survive an annual night of terror where all crime is legal for 12 hours.

programme.title: Addicted
programme.desc: A successful businesswoman (Sharon Leal) puts her family, career and life on the line to satisfy her addiction to sex.

programme.title: Annabelle Comes Home
programme.desc: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren keep a possessed doll locked up in an artifacts room in their house. When the doll awakens the room's evil spirits, it soon becomes a night of terror for the couple's young daughter and her friends.

programme.title: Your Monster
programme.desc: A soft-spoken actress finds her voice again when she meets a terrifying but weirdly charming monster that lives in her closet.

programme.title: Waitress
programme.desc: A pregnant waitress (Keri Russell) is caught between her controlling husband (Jeremy Sisto) and the new town doctor (Nathan Fillion), with whom she is having a steamy affair.

programme.title: The Other Side of the Door
programme.desc: A grieving mother (Sarah Wayne Callies) upsets the balance between life and death when she opens an ancient door that releases the restless spirit of her deceased son (Logan Creran).

programme.title: Tuesday
programme.desc: A mother and her daughter must confront Death when it arrives in the form of an astonishing talking bird.

programme.title: Elevation
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic survivors find refuge in the Rocky Mountains to hide from giant, insect-like creatures that can't live above 8,000 feet. However, when one of them needs life-saving supplies, they risk it all to venture into the danger zone.

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: A 15-year-old (Jahking Guillory) recruits his two best friends (Christopher Meyer, Christopher Jordan Wallace) to help him retrieve his stolen Air Jordan sneakers from a neighborhood thug (Kofi Siriboe).

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: Criminals and some crooked cops hatch a devious scheme to use an honest lawman as a pawn for a heist.

programme.desc: The Green Lanterns have little regard for humans, who have been unable to harness the powers of the ring each member wears. But Jordan, a test pilot, may be the corps' only hope when an enemy called Parallax threatens the universal balance of power.

programme.desc: It chronicles the modern day, celestial land grab happening above our heads. It's a fast paced, high stakes race of epic proportions in which companies compete to blast satellite carrying rockets into low earth orbit.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: After landing US Airways Flight 1549 in New York's Hudson River, Capt. Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger (Tom Hanks) faces an investigation that threatens to destroy his career and reputation.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Armed with proton packs, four paranormal investigators (Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis) battle mischievous ghouls in New York.

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
programme.desc: Now the parapsychologists (Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd) are trying to rid New York of stress-related pink slime.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A Treasury agent (J.K. Simmons) closes in on a brilliant freelance accountant (Ben Affleck) who works for dangerous criminal organizations.

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: Dangerously ill with a rare blood disorder and determined to save others from the same fate, Dr. Morbius attempts a desperate gamble. While at first it seems to be a radical success, a darkness inside of him is soon unleashed.

programme.title: The Front Room
programme.desc: Everything goes to hell for newly pregnant Belinda after her mother-in-law moves in. As the diabolical guest tries to get her claws on the child, Belinda must draw the line somewhere.

programme.desc: Following a strange sexual encounter, a teenager (Maika Monroe) has disturbing visions and the inescapable feeling that someone -- or something -- is stalking her.

programme.title: Love Lies Bleeding
programme.desc: A bodybuilder heading through town to Vegas is thrust into the dangerous plot of a violent crime family when she falls into a steamy romance with her trainer.

programme.title: 37 Words
programme.desc: In the 1960s, women's opportunities in America are fundamentally limited. But when the civil rights movement reveals a new path to progress, the creativity and determination of a small group leads to the passage of Title IX, a law few saw coming.

programme.title: 37 Words
programme.desc: In the 1970s, buoyed by Title IX, the first generation of the new legislation's beneficiaries work to turn its lofty legal language into a reality. At times at great personal cost, these women transform the promise of 37 words into true progress.

programme.title: 37 Words
programme.desc: After a generation of Title IX, women who've had the doors of opportunity opened to them become stars who win Olympic gold medals and World Cups, persevering past discrimination to inspire young girls and boys alike and create even more change.
